Name: ArmA3ExileMod
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install ArmA III including ExileMod and run it.

TCP GamePort.Name: TCP GamePort
TCP GamePort.Description: TCP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new TCP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...' and change the port number, never forget that ArmA III uses the starting port number with TCP and UDP and the following 4 ascendant port numbers UDP)

TCP MariaDB.Name: TCP MariaDB
TCP MariaDB.Description: Not required, only if you want to connect to the database from outside. Delete if you allready have a MariaDB container running.

GAME_ID.Name: GAME_ID
GAME_ID.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
(https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

GAME_PARAMS.Name: GAME_PARAMS
GAME_PARAMS.Description:
Enter your start up commands for the server.
Note: To change the Port of the server please click on 'Show more settings' button, don't forget to change the other ports.

Steam-Username.Name: Steam-Username
Steam-Username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Steam-Password.Name: Steam-Password
Steam-Password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Validate Installation.Name: Validate Installation
Validate Installation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

MariaDB Root Password.Name: MariaDB Root Password
MariaDB Root Password.Description: Enter the preffered root password of the database.

Workshop Item Manual Installation.Name: Workshop Item Manual Installation
Workshop Item Manual Installation.Description:
Please set to 'true' (without quotes) if you want to install the Workshopcontent for ExileMod manually since the account you specified above must have a valid game purchase for ArmA3 (you could also use one account to download the dedicated server files and another to install the Workshop files).
A COMPLETE HOW TO WILL BE IN THE CONSOLE
WARNING: Please let this variable set to 'true' if you initially set it to 'true'.

ExileMod Server URL.Name: ExileMod Server URL
ExileMod Server URL.Description: Change only if you know what you are doing!
